page.title: 14The Vicar
page.content: Our vicar ministers to the churches of both Stallingborough and Healing parishes.He has been a vicar at Stallingborough for twenty years.When he was seventeen he decided to be a vicar because he felt God calling him.He doesnt just take services.He visits our school.Also he is responsible for all the people in the parish and helps them with their problems.They can see him at any time and he can have up to forty calls a day!He listens to peoples problems and advises them in strict confidence.He holds services at both churches and more people go than you would expect.He enjoys doing weddings and baptisms because he can share in peoples joy.One thing the vicar does not like it if anybody is late but generally he enjoys being a vicar.He says he wouldnt do any other job.
